snippet: A federal judge is deciding whether to unseal testimony on Anthony Galea, who pleaded guilty to smuggling human growth hormone into the United States.
abstract: MLB lawyers press federal judge to unseal grand jury testimony in case of Anthony Galea, Toronto-based doctor who pleaded guilty in 2011 to smuggling human growth hormone into the United States; records would presumably include testimony from Alex Rodriguez, who faces 211-game doping suspension.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge is deciding whether to unseal testimony on Anthony Galea, who pleaded guilty to smuggling human growth hormone into the United States.

headline.main: M.L.B. Seeks Records on a Rodriguez Doctor
headline.print_headline:
M.L.B. Requests Testimony
In Rodriguez Doctor’s Case
